publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4166 Alasdair Allan: Quarriers’ Epilepsy Support—That the Parliament congratulates Quarriers for the invaluable support it provides to people with epilepsy across Scotland; supports Quarriers’ work in highlighting the misconceptions surrounding epilepsy during National Epilepsy Week, 17 to 23 May 2009; recognises the important role played by Quarriers’ fieldworkers in ensuring that people with epilepsy are motivated to achieve their full potential in their own communities; commends the work of the Quarriers’ National Epilepsy Centre for Scotland, the only facility of its kind in Scotland, and further praises Quarriers’ commitment to raising awareness of this condition and delivering care of the highest quality across Scotland. Supported by: Bill Wilson*, Jackie Baillie*, Mary Mulligan*, Robert Brown*, Bob Doris*, Jim Tolson*, Christina McKelvie*, Stuart McMillan*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Patricia Ferguson*, Robin Harper*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Bill Kidd*, Jamie McGrigor*, Sandra White*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Ian McKee*, Brian Adam*, Mary Scanlon*
S3M-4166 Quarriers’ Epilepsy Support (lodged on 18 May 2009) Jim Hume*, Cathy Peattie*, Nanette Milne*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Gil Paterson*, Jamie Hepburn*
